content: join with slip_stitch and fasten_off ccb do not turn lace border with right side facing you attach cca in right-hand corner at one short end of piece 2 row 1 chain 3 double_crochet in next single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet work double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet v-st completed *skip 2 single_crochet double_crochet in ea of next 3 single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet v-st in next single_crochet repeat from * across ending with skip 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet work v-st skip 2 single_crochet double_crochet in ea of last 2 single_crochet turn 15 v sts 14 3-double_crochet groups row 2 chain 3 in space of next v-st work 7 double_crochet shell completed *double_crochet in center double_crochet of next 3-double_crochet group shell in next v-st repeat from * across skip second to last double_crochet double_crochet in top of turning chain turn 15 shells row 3 chain 4 double_crochet in same st at base of chain counts as beg v-st *skip next 2 double_crochet on shell double_crochet in ea of next 3 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet on shell v-st in next double_crochet repeat from * across ending with last v-st worked into top of turning chain turn 16 v-sts row 4 slip_stitch in space of first v-st chain 3 work 3 double_crochet in same space double_crochet in center double_crochet of next 3-double_crochet group *shell in next v-st double_crochet in center double_crochet of next 3-double_crochet group repeat from * across ending with 4 double_crochet in space of last v-st fasten_off repeat lace border at other end of lapghan finishing weave in all tails if necessary gently wash and block lapghan copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 3
